oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Wind and Weather. The Four Winds. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-1. 6096-6101). The south wind blows, 'standing above', and 'makes dust'. 1) See also The north wind and The east wind and The west wind, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The south wind
